hotels.title: Swiss Alps Ski-In Ski-Out Kempinski Retreat with Two-Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Hidden high in the tremendously spectacular Swiss Alps is the historic Grand Hotel des Bains Kempinski St Moritz, a winter oasis that redefines five-star luxury in the heart of the world-famous Engadin Valley. Explore the valley’s light-filled, mythical expanses, an adventurer’s paradise brimming with untouched natural vistas, world-class galleries, peerless ski slopes and the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Rhaetian Railway - an engineering masterpiece that crosses spectacular viaducts as it heads from St Moritz to the lonely heights of Alp Grüm. Grand Hotel des Bains Kempinski St Moritz is the perfect ski-in, ski-out base to savour these many delights, with a sprawling onsite spa and four excellent dining venues, including Cà d’Oro, whose flawless Mediterranean cuisine has earned them 17 Gault Millau points and two coveted Michelin Stars.
